mapper.sql: rat_num, email, lan_code, id, interior, rat_access, cost_effect, rat_comment, rat_date
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sr.rat_num as ratNum, sr.id as id, s.name as name, sr.email as email, sr.lan_code as lanCode, sr.interior as interior, sr.rat_access as ratAccess, sr.cost_effect as costEffect, sr.rat_comment as ratComment, sr.rat_date as ratDate FROM storeRating sr JOIN store s ON sr.lan_code = s.lan_code AND sr.id = s.id WHERE sr.id = #{id} and sr.lan_code= #{lanCode}
